articles.content: A large study of patients in the United States who contracted Covid-19 confirms many complications of the disease, according to new research. The research was published in CMAJ (Canadian Medical Asso… [+1961 chars]

articles.title: Covid vaccine: The facts and data explained - BBC Newsnight - BBC News
articles.description: As the world’s first #Covid19 jab are administered - the fastest delivered vaccine in history - is the end of the pandemic really in sight? Please subscribe ...
